traits.name: Ability Adjustment
traits.description: Customize your ability scores by adjusting each ability Â±1 (total adjustments must sum to 0). For example: +1 Strength, +1 Dexterity, -1 Wisdom, -1 Charisma.

traits.name: Additional Arms
traits.description: Up to 2 additional arms. When making multiple attacks, can reduce the penalty to the attack roll by 2.

traits.name: Biotech Augmentation
traits.description: Augmented with biotechnology. Select one Bio-Implant at Character Creation.

traits.name: Breathe Underwater
traits.description: Amphibious and cannot drown in water. Can have gill slits or similar external features.

traits.name: Climate Adaptation
traits.description: Resistant to a specific climate. Select one: freezing, rarefied atmosphere, searing, smoky, tropical, or watery. When challenged by an environmental factor in that climate, can reroll an Endurance or Survival check, taking the better result.

traits.name: Conductive
traits.description: Naturally generate a small amount of electrical energy and use as a Natural Weapon in an Unarmed attack, dealing 1d6 points of Energy damage. Character is always considered armed with a Natural Weapon.

traits.name: Cultural Cybernetics
traits.description: Culture commonly augments members with cybernetics from birth. Select one Cybernetic Enhancement at Character Creation.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: Can ignore Concealment (including Total Concealment) from darkness. However, you cannot perceive colors in total darkness.

traits.name: Empath
traits.description: Can use the Telepathy application of the Use the Force skill Untrained, and without having the Force Sensitivity Feat. Additionally, can sense the emotions of a target if the Use the Force check equals or exceeds the target's Will Defense.

traits.name: Expert Swimmer
traits.description: Can reroll a Swim check, but the result of the reroll must be accepted, even if it is worse. Can Take 10 on Swim checks when distracted or threatened.

traits.name: Heightened Awareness
traits.description: Can reroll a Perception check, but the result of the reroll must be accepted, even if it is worse.

traits.name: Low-Light Vision
traits.description: Can ignore Concealment (but not Total Concealment) from darkness.

traits.name: Natural Armor
traits.description: Thickened skin or natural armor plates grant a Natural Armor bonus of +1 to Reflex Defense.

traits.name: Natural Weapon
traits.description: Can use natural claws in an Unarmed attack, dealing 1d6 points of Slashing damage instead of normal Unarmed damage. Character is always considered armed with the Natural Weapons.

traits.name: Naturally Acrobatic
traits.description: Considered Trained in the Acrobatics skill, even if it is not normally a Class Skill for the character.

traits.name: Persistent
traits.description: Can reroll an Endurance check, but the result of the reroll must be accepted, even if it is worse.

traits.name: Quick
traits.description: Increases Base Speed by 1 square.

traits.name: Quick Healing
traits.description: At the end of an encounter, regain Hit Points equal to 1d4 + Constitution modifier (minimum 1).

traits.name: Resistant
traits.description: Naturally resistant to Poisons, Diseases, Radiation, or other Hazards, gaining a +2 Species bonus to Fortitude Defense. Gamemaster can restrict resistance to a single, specific Hazard.

traits.name: Scent
traits.description: At close range (within 10 squares), ignore Concealment and Cover for purposes of Perception checks, and take no penalty from poor visibility when using the Track application of the Survival skill.

traits.name: Spring Step
traits.description: When using the High Jump or Long Jump applications of the Jump skill, reduce the number of squares required for a running start by 2.

traits.name: Strength Surge
traits.description: Once per encounter, can reroll one Strength-based Ability or Skill Check, doubling the character's Strength modifier (minimum +1), or can add 2 to a single damage roll on a successful melee attack. This does not apply when Weapon Finesse is used.

traits.name: Visually Striking
traits.description: Character's appearance is visually surprising or stunning. The character's Charisma bonus is doubled when using the Persuasion skill on Humans, Near-Humans, and similar humanoids (such as Twi'leks).

traits.name: Weapon Familiarity
traits.description: Character selects a single Exotic Weapon and treats it as a Simple Weapon instead. Must be commonly used by character's native culture.

variants.name: Eye Variation
variants.description: Eyes are of an unusual color and/or pupils are of an unusual shape.

variants.name: Digit Variation
variants.description: Number of digits on each hand or foot is greater or fewer than 5, but without affecting Skill use in terms of game mechanics.

variants.name: Fins
variants.description: Character has small fins that have no effect on swimming.

variants.name: Hair Variation
variants.description: Character's hair is naturally an unusual color, length, texture, or size.

variants.name: Shaped
variants.description: Character has been biologically altered by the Yuuzhan Vong shaping process. This can account for the character's Near-Human Trait, or the trait might be cosmetic or for roleplaying purposes. Shaped characters typically gain Yuuzhan Vong physical features or are otherwise physically altered.

variants.name: Skin Color
variants.description: Skin is naturally a color (or a combination of colors) not normally associated with Humans.

variants.name: Skin Texture
variants.description: Obviously unusual skin texture, such as leathery, especially smooth, overly wrinkled, or scaly.

variants.name: Teeth Variation
variants.description: Teeth are noticeably differently colored, sharper, larger, or smaller than those of typical Humans.

variants.name: Towering
variants.description: Over 2 meters tall, although the additional height does not change the character's Size.
